description: Returns the evaluation results for the specified Amazon Web Services resource. The results indicate which Config rules were used to evaluate the resource, when each rule was last invoked, and whether the resource complies with each rule.

parameters.name: ComplianceTypes
parameters.description: Filters the results by compliance. INSUFFICIENT_DATA is a valid ComplianceType that is returned when an Config rule cannot be evaluated. However, INSUFFICIENT_DATA cannot be used as a ComplianceType for filtering results. (string) ---

parameters.name: ResourceEvaluationId
parameters.description: The unique ID of Amazon Web Services resource execution for which you want to retrieve evaluation results.

nested_items.name: EvaluationResults
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the specified Amazon Web Services resource complies each Config rule.

nested_items.name: EvaluationResultQualifier
nested_items.description: Identifies an Config rule used to evaluate an Amazon Web Services resource, and provides the type and ID of the evaluated resource.

nested_items.name: ConfigRuleName
nested_items.description: The name of the Config rule that was used in the evaluation.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of Amazon Web Services resource that was evaluated.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the evaluated Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_items.name: EvaluationMode
nested_items.description: The mode of an evaluation. The valid values are Detective or Proactive.

nested_items.name: OrderingTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time of the event that triggered the evaluation of your Amazon Web Services resources. The time can indicate when Config delivered a configuration item change notification, or it can indicate when Config delivered the configuration snapshot, depending on which event triggered the evaluation.

nested_items.name: ResourceEvaluationId
nested_items.description: A Unique ID for an evaluation result.

nested_items.name: ComplianceType
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the Amazon Web Services resource complies with the Config rule that evaluated it.

nested_items.name: ResultRecordedTime
nested_items.description: The time when Config recorded the evaluation result.

nested_items.name: ConfigRuleInvokedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the Config rule evaluated the Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_items.name: Annotation
nested_items.description: Supplementary information about how the evaluation determined the compliance.

nested_items.name: ResultToken
nested_items.description: An encrypted token that associates an evaluation with an Config rule. The token identifies the rule, the Amazon Web Services resource being evaluated, and the event that triggered the evaluation.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The string that you use in a subsequent request to get the next page of results in a paginated response.
